```{r}
#Load observations file
obs <- read.csv('data/obs.csv', stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#Observations data frame structure
str(obs, width=60, strict.width='cut')

#Summary of object properties observed
table(obs$property)

#Sample observations of each property
t(sapply(unique(obs$property), function(x) {
  sobs <- obs[obs$property==x,]; sobs[1, ] }))
```

#data observations
nobs <- 100

dtstamp <- seq(from=Sys.time(), length.out=nobs, by='mins')
object <- sample(c('obj1', 'obj2', 'obj3', 'obj4'), nobs, replace=TRUE)
property <- sample(c('prop1', 'prop2', 'prop3', 'prop4'), nobs, replace=TRUE)
value <- rnorm(nobs)

obs <- data.frame(dtstamp, object, property, value)
